meaningMnemonic: The <radical>door</radical> a <radical>criminal</radical> will get into is the <kanji>front door</kanji>. Now hold on, you may be thinking, wouldn't they go for the back door? No! 99% of home invasions happen when you leave your own front door unlocked!
readingMnemonic: To protect your <kanji>front door</kanji> from criminals you plan to fill it with <reading>hea</reading>t (ひ). Oh yeah, we're gonna Kevin McCallister this.
